com.astamuse.asta4d.data.annotation

Annotation Type ContextData


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value={FIELD,METHOD,PARAMETER})
public @interface ContextData
    This annotation is for marking a field (including getter/setter method) or a method parameter as Context associated.
    Author:
    e-ryu
    See Also:
    InjectUtil

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String name
      The name of associated context data, if not specified, the inject process will use the field/parameter name as context data name.
      boolean reverse
      Deprecated. 
      String scope
      The scope of associated context data, if not specified, the inject process will try to find it in a predefined search order in all scopes.
      TypeUnMacthPolicy typeUnMatch
      the policy of how to handle the unmatched type on data conversion.

    • Element Detail

      • name

        public abstract String name
        The name of associated context data, if not specified, the inject process will use the field/parameter name as context data name.
        Default:
        ""

      • scope

        public abstract String scope
        The scope of associated context data, if not specified, the inject process will try to find it in a predefined search order in all scopes.
        Default:
        ""

      • reverse

        @Deprecated
public abstract boolean reverse
        Deprecated. 
        It is only valid on field or getter method, if it is set to true, when a snippet execution finished, the current value of the field will be reversely injected to Context. This specification is not necessary and it also complicate the variable injection mechanism. It should be removed at sometime.
        Default:
        false

      • typeUnMatch

        public abstract TypeUnMacthPolicy typeUnMatch
        the policy of how to handle the unmatched type on data conversion.
        Default:
        com.astamuse.asta4d.data.TypeUnMacthPolicy.EXCEPTION
